Articles.Content: StarVision, first, your mods are excellent! Type 40 Time And Relative Dimension In Space capsule is too much fun, as well is the Star Trek vessels. I have a challenge for you, the Jool Jupiter Mining Corporation ship, the Red Dwarf, Star Bug and Blue Midget.

StarVision, first, your mods are excellent! Type 40 Time And Relative Dimension In Space capsule is too much fun, as well is the Star Trek vessels. I have a challenge for you, the Jool Jupiter Mining Corporation ship, the Red Dwarf, Star Bug and Blue Midget.

Despite it being kind of low on the poll, I plan on creating it eventually. Probably starbug first. Although Red Dwarf is more iconic, it's pretty massive.

I'll create another list on my plan, mostly for my benefit.

1. Release Voyager (fix some texture issues)

2. Release Tardis v3, K-57-D, and Enterprise v3 (all partly finished)

3. Something not Star Trek (Starbug?)

4. Modular Starship parts.
hi, using the voyager cfg as a test thing for my Daedalus, how do I make it more responsive in the cfg, as I had to make it bigger?? not having issue by the way with the impulse drive

hi, using the voyager cfg as a test thing for my Daedalus, how do I make it more responsive in the cfg, as I had to make it bigger?? not having issue by the way with the impulse drive
Increase the torque in the Reaction wheel module. I had to do this for the Enterprise with the 0.23.5 update.

3. Something not Star Trek (Starbug?)

How about Normandy SR-2 from Mass Effect or something from that universe (they have some nice looking ships). Or perhaps something from the Alien universe. Such as the USS Sulaco or the iconic UD-4L Dropship from Aliens.

So I had a "burst" of inspiration after seeing this image. I made this. I'm actually really happy with it. I wouldn't worry about me not working on Voyager though, I just need something to do when I've had enough Trek.

I had to cut it down to 20 k, but I added a low poly mesh to all parts. it got a front loading cargo bay, 2 big cargo bay, 2 small ones next to it with animated doors, yes, guest I can only add 1 animation part, starvision

as for future plans, not sure, maybe a starbase,looking up all kinds of pics, reason was asking what size u can have that will draw the textures, as in skyrim it had a cut point that it can`t draw. but there are so many ships I can make, might try a flying futuristic car, something simpler lol.never made a mod that took me this long, got a futuristic dome that would fit great in this game, released over 5-6k meshes for games , I`m sure I got something that could fit in here lol, but I will make new stuff, more fun to see your stuff work

there are currently fluctuations in the structure of the developpment we had so far..

Different release schedules forced us to reconsider.

StarVision came up with this.

It seems he would prefere if the plugin would be a independent download.

In short: Is anyone intrested in an own thread for LCARS related questions and mods?

Actually I'm afraid that thread would be a dead zombie after 2 days. lol

However - determining the potential of an own thread for the LCARS plugin is the topic right now.

Benefits: This would allow to create a mod-list in the first post to feature all creations like your deadalus.

Each has: Pic, creator, name, short description, link.

After all, if it was made to work with LCARS - we could aswell pull somewhat together on the publishing end.

There I could link to what ever method of publishing you choose for your ships.

Either you make an own thread or post just a link in the LCARS thread..

Since this plugin can work with any creations, this would actually make a lot of sense..

If many modders participate, this could become a HUGE fleet list of new kind of KSP ships.

I would love that idea.. - it was hard work to code that thing - less than 2000 mods would be a dissapointment haha

(I warned you before, I am megalomaniac lol)

No seriousely - allready now, we have enough LCARS ships in dev to formulate the need for a central registry so the KSP players can come choose and click.

No matter if StarVisions great ships or all th awesomness there is to come..

They should all be listed together somewhere if they fly with impulse - because impulse is a KSP game breaker.

It's a new/different game with LCARS. Let's show the flag and make a fleet list!

mjy: Would you personally consider using that thread for your creations?

without modders like you, that thread would be a useless waste of time and bytes..

yes your getting down to finishing your impulse drive or doing touch up, prob a good time to add a post for it and linking all ships that can or will use that pluging

prob a post with impulse drive /custom ships, etc, not sure what u could add, if u start one just tell me I`ll post in there

Those banners are looking really good, although it brings up a question. Do you never raise the landing gear? In your videos and that image the landing gear is always down. Is there a reason?

Long post...

Anyways, I'm back for another month of staying at home, so I should be able to do more work. First goal is to complete and release Voyager. That should be finished this week. After that I'll finish up all my half-done projects, then other stuff.

not really a clue what could cause this..

you add the impulse drive to the mech jeb part?

Wow - never thought of this happening - the low weight of the part might produce trouble for crew quartiers and cargo bay - but that would only come up when the ship is loaded..

If it crashes at the loading screen, I would say check the logs..

you will see which part reports what problem.

my best guess is you have a syntax error in one of the cfg files..

check your logs, if that does not tell you how to fix it, post the important lines here - I will have a look..

(don't post a 3 meter log please - just the needed lines)
This might seem like a silly question, but how does one go about achieving a stable orbit with impulse. Mine end up all over the place.

This might seem like a silly question, but how does one go about achieving a stable orbit with impulse. Mine end up all over the place.

This video shows it a little

http://youtu.be/FKhiAHbGeCE?t=3m19s

Impulse will constantly pull on your ship while it's running..

KSP does not like that and calculates a lot of orbit-line movement.

but that is not an issue..

you can:

- deactivate impulse to stabilize your orbit

- activate "Full halt" to keep your position

- hit "Hold speed" and Hold height" and configure your orbit that way..

the latter option allows even for stuff like this:

http://imgur.com/8fwGMQv

I've added this question to the wiki..

https://github.com/philotical/StarTrekImpulseDrive/wiki/FAQ---Frequently-asked-questions:
